MajorClaims.MC1: every prospective between generations alters and especially the challenges for this generation are significantly different from the last generation
MajorClaims.MC2: challenges for this generation are more complicated and diverse than the past generation, whether in career or in self-identification

Claims.C1: it is no doubt that until the next generation, there will be whole new challenges waiting for the next youngsters
Claims.C2: under globalization and industrial integration, the work-related challenges for this generation are getting more complicated and challenging
Claims.C3: young people in this generation are exposed to more creative ideas and rather think individually
Claims.C4: this generation is encountering the self-recognition issue which could not be experienced by the previous generation

Premises.P1: In the past, focusing on one skill was enough to deal with the problems
Premises.P2: every industry was rather small in size and simple to manage
Premises.P3: as those industries expand and become internationalized, people are required to equip with multiple skills to answer those challenges
Premises.P4: now there are more chances to do business with people around the world
Premises.P5: besides one's own profession, language ability is essential as well
Premises.P6: financial crimes are rampant in the 21st century
Premises.P7: surging up demands for those who excel at both laws and financial management
Premises.P8: The past generation was given less freedom and was usually asked to follow the paths their parents had prepared for them
Premises.P9: They are eager for finding who they are and what they really want
Premises.P10: It is fortunate that they can struggle with these sweet worries and these worries are indeed never easy for them
Premises.P11: They have to make decisions between so many possibilities and they are responsible for taking the consequences
